refbody.section: PurposeDisplay licenses and require the command line interface (CLI) user to accept or reject licenses.

ExampleRun the license acceptance process.Console> license accept Bedrock Project, WebSphere Technical Institute Copyright 2009-2010, IBM Corporation
This is your sample license.
Accept; Reject: accept Console>

Information for consumers onlySee the "Bedrock Command Line Interface (CLI)" and "Customizing and extending the CLI" pages in the SDK documentation for more information about license acceptance on the appliance.
